by Emma Wesel

Election Night isnt going how Hillary Clinton hoped PERIOD Donald Trump with no political experience under his belt is giving the former Senator and Secretary of State a run for her money or her pantsuits PERIOD Trump and Clinton are in a tight race for electoral votes in the battleground states PERIOD



Virginia just flipped in Clintons favor with  percent of the vote counted PERIOD She is now leading there by around  votes PERIOD Clinton is still trailing in North Carolina though only  percent of the state has been reported PERIOD Trump has less than a  lead in North Carolina a state that Romney won in  and would help him reach  votes PERIOD  Trump has a . percent lead in North Carolina PERIOD

Florida has  percent of the vote counted and Trumpis leading by around  votes PERIOD Colorado is looking strong for Clinton with  percent of the vote counted and a . percent lead.Stay tuned as the final counts come out in states such as Florida and Virginia PERIOD

The Independent Voice of Southern Methodist University Since
